Articles.Content:
After the Great Forum Purge, over six months of threads, posts, and content were eliminated. Here is where you can post some of your (or others') memorable posts or even threads from the pre-Purge forum.

I have the fish-covered surface of the Mun:

Not my picture, I just drew the sea-creatures on there

Edited April 19, 2013 by rryy

Yeah I remember my XMAS special

Of my try at horsecraft engineering

My avatar, and this post count.

Honestly, I liked that post count >.<

Oh well.

Not to mention my dev thread and mod pages. Plus I have a new PC so all modding data is lost.
Big drop of bandwidth use on my generator's host
Has my poor post count been decimated?
Yes, it has ;_;

Yes, it has ;_;

At least it didnÃ‚Â´t dissapear

Mine had about 160ish posts,o well

At least i can see old threads easier
I think I had about 550 posts before Josef Kalin purged the forums.

I was up to about 600+

Contribootin':

From the failed Gagarin's Socks joke of the BobCat dev thread

Also, the great april fools joke that had the mods in a fuss~<3

At least it didnÃ‚Â´t dissapear

Mine had about 160ish posts,o well

At least i can see old threads easier

Problem is, my sidebar thing lists me as having been here almost a year and only having 103 posts. This is unacceptable. As far as the forum is concerned you just signed up.
Google page cache says I had 500 posts before the purge. I remember I didn't post much at all in my first ~6 months here, so most of those were eaten.
Can the forum admins actually edit our stats? All I would like is my date joined and post count changed back. Everything else I can attempt to recover myself.

Can the forum admins actually edit our stats? All I would like is my date joined and post count changed back. Everything else I can attempt to recover myself.

I think they can, but I don't think they plan to. (At least on a wide spread scale)

I too would like my join date and post count changed back to October 28 2012 and 300+.
Not much in my posts. But I can understand the frustration people have. Just don't freak out, okay?
I was deleted... luckily I (like Spock, and the Highlander) am Immortal! Muahahahaha LOL It is annoying having to start over all my forums stuff tho...

Unfortunately if we began honoring requests to rollback to your true stats, the floodgates would be open, and situations where you doubt the true stats will arise. If we had the manpower and the assurance of legitimacy we'd do it.

Please bear with it, we will always remember those post counts.
Just use google cache as evidence
I'd honestly be fine with my outdated February stats from Google's cache.

got around 670+ posts, already on a distinguished road, 2 missions on-going, 2 challenges running, and had my name changed.

All was lost. And reverted back.
This thread is for memories, not wishes

This thread is for memories, not wishes

I have memories of having 193 posts

Unfortunately if we began honoring requests to rollback to your true stats, the floodgates would be open, and situations where you doubt the true stats will arise. If we had the manpower and the assurance of legitimacy we'd do it.

Please bear with it, we will always remember those post counts.

I know we can't legitimatly prove our post count (I'm not too sure about google caches), but what about join dates? There would be no cheating in that sense.

Join dates are not going to be altered either, please stay on topic in the off-topic (with respect to the thread title).

I remember my beautiful Forum Forum FAQ ;;, need to re write that.

I remember my 15 posts

that is... not in off-topic(I probably had at least 75 in off-topic)

I should dig around in the warehouse for my time machine... IÃ‚Â´ll see what I can do to prevent this disaster. I miss my rep and posts.

EDIT: Nope. It might be that I actually caused this disaster trying to prevent it, so I guess that there is some kind of paradox prevention system in this universe. Damnit. CURSE YOU UNCHANGEABLE TIMELINE! (It was not me who screwed us up initially, the crash was inevitable. I just tried to stop it :| )

Edited April 20, 2013 by Jones-250
Timelines.
